overview:
Louise Corliss serves as the VP of Sales for SocialMadeSimple. She oversees and leads all sales team management and training, client management and business development.

Prior to joining SocialMadeSimple in early 2010, Louise co-founded and owned Compass Mortgage, Inc., a successful, full-service retail mortgage company where she was responsible for the growth of nearly $100 million in loans annually. Louise has an extensive background in sales, management and operations with specific expertise in the real estate and mortgage industries. Throughout her career, she has demonstrated a proven ability in establishing and maintaining outstanding customer service that has been significant in driving growth in both new and existing businesses.
